data.actual_result: There is a colour effect around the mention's text even though the mention highlights for you
data.expected_result: The colour effect surrounding the mention's text should not be present, as it should only appear on role mentions that do not highlight for you
data.short_description: Role mentions that highlight for you still show the colour effect around them
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a mentionable role (give it a colour so that it's noticeable) and give yourself the role - Mention the role in chat and observe the surrounding of the mention's text
